GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object containing an article matching the given article_id on a key of article

article.author: John Doe
article.title: The Future of tech
article.body: This is a sample article about the future of technology.

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of all comments for the given article id.

exampleResponse.body: This is a body of the comment.
exampleResponse.author: JohnDoe

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: adds a comment for an article by the given article id and respond with the added comment

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates an article of the given article id and responds with the updated article

updatedArticle.author: John Doe
updatedArticle.title: The Future of tech
updatedArticle.body: This is a sample article about the future of technology.
